Package model

Class Road

java.lang.Object
model.Project
model.Road
public class Road extends Project
The Road class represents a road construction project, extending the Project class.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Road

      public Road(int length, int width, int numberOfBridges, int numberOfTunnels, int id, String title, int expectedBudget, int expectedMonths, MyDate creationDate, MyDate endingDate, ArrayList<String> environmentalChallenges)
      Constructs a new road construction project with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      length - The length of the road.
      width - The width of the road.
      numberOfBridges - The number of bridges in the road.
      numberOfTunnels - The number of tunnels in the road.
      id - The project ID.
      title - The project title.
      expectedBudget - The expected budget for the project.
      expectedMonths - The expected duration of the project in months.
      creationDate - The date when the project was created.
      endingDate - The date when the project is expected to end.
      environmentalChallenges - The list of environmental challenges associated with the road.
